jobs.title: Senior Product Manager
jobs.company_blurb: Firefly builds cloud automation software that helps enterprise engineering teams manage infrastructure across AWS, Azure, and GCP with precision and transparency.
jobs.role_summary: Own the roadmap for developer productivity and cross-cloud orchestration, defining APIs and tools that improve reliability and release velocity.

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager
jobs.company_blurb: Tyrell Corporation designs intelligent systems for enterprise analytics, bridging classical data warehouses with AI-native observability.
jobs.role_summary: Define the next generation of data APIs and ML-powered observability features used by engineering teams globally.

jobs.title: Staff Product Manager
jobs.company_blurb: Nimbus Cloud is a fast-growing SaaS platform providing scalable developer infrastructure for global software teams.
jobs.role_summary: Lead strategy and roadmap for Kubernetes orchestration and multi-tenant infrastructure reliability.

jobs.title: Principal Product Manager, Developer Experience
jobs.company_blurb: Volt Systems provides internal developer platforms that unify metrics, deployment, and observability across distributed teams.
jobs.role_summary: Drive platform initiatives that improve developer velocity, automation, and system reliability through intuitive internal tooling.

jobs.title: Senior PM, Data Platform
jobs.company_blurb: Helios Analytics builds modern data infrastructure for fast-moving startups, focused on scalable ETL and real-time analytics pipelines.
jobs.role_summary: Define and execute data platform vision, from ingestion to insight, for analytics and ML readiness.

jobs.title: Group Product Manager, Platform Reliability
jobs.company_blurb: Quantum Forge provides large-scale infrastructure solutions for cloud-native organizations running critical workloads.
jobs.role_summary: Lead multiple PMs in shaping reliability and scalability initiatives across the platform engineering stack.

jobs.title: Product Manager, ML Infrastructure
jobs.company_blurb: Blue Horizon Labs builds high-performance ML infrastructure that powers model deployment and monitoring at scale.
jobs.role_summary: Own the ML platform roadmap, improving data ingestion, feature store quality, and production model reliability.

jobs.title: Technical Program Manager
jobs.company_blurb: Lunaris builds orchestration tools for AI compute clusters, optimizing workloads and reducing infrastructure costs.
jobs.role_summary: Coordinate technical programs that improve orchestration reliability and cross-team data workflows.

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager, Core Systems
jobs.company_blurb: Vertex Dynamics creates platform software for large-scale data processing and analytics at financial institutions.
jobs.role_summary: Own the strategy and prioritization for core platform reliability and performance tooling.

jobs.title: Product Manager, AI Enablement
jobs.company_blurb: Orion Labs develops enterprise-grade AI tools that enable teams to integrate language models into existing business systems.
jobs.role_summary: Collaborate with engineering and research to design and deliver APIs that bring LLM-powered insights into enterprise workflows.
